name: GW-API-v2 (S2S)
description: Documentation for the GrowishPay API V2 (S2S Branch)
title: GrowishPay API V2

header.title: Introduction
header.content:
Introduction

Base URL

Production: https://api.growish.com/v2/:domain

Sandbox: https://apidev.growish.com/v2/:domain

Authentication

The server to server version of this API uses Basic Auth. In basic HTTP authentication, a request contains a header field in the form of Authorization: Basic , where credentials is the Base64 encoding of ID and password joined by a single colon :.

Before using any of the environments you need to contact a sales representative from GrowishPay, he or she will provide you with test credentials.

Security

The sandbox environment allows connections from any IPs but forces you to use SSL as is mandatory to protect your credentials. In Production a whitelist is generated with the IPs of your server clients and mutual SSL authentication is available. THIS IS A BACKEND API. DO NOT MAKE CALLS FROM YOUR FRONTEND.

Domain

Your base URL contains a :domain variable, it will be given to you by a GrowishPay consultant along with your credentials.

   

How to use the GrowishPay REST API

We designed the API in a very RESTful way, so that your user experience is simple and straightforward.

You are able to:

  • Submit data requires an HTTP POST request
  • Retrieve data requires an HTTP GET request
  • Change data requires an HTTP PUT request

Requests must be sent using Content-Type "application/json". The request and response body encoding is always UTF-8.

Formats used

IDs: Mongo ObjectId

Dates: ISO Date

Amounts: Int in cents

Sensitive case: The fields and parameter names in requests are case sensitive

Work in progress

This documentation is still in progress, many others features are being develop and documented like webhooks to notify your client when payment requests are fulfill. Please check this documentation often for updates.
